entry.title: (KonMari Method)
entry.content:
"spark joy"

"..."

-
If you want to lead a life that sparks joy,
there is only one thing that you must do --
()
and that is to tidy your home
Choose to keep only the things that speak to your heart...
and let go of everything else.
Tidying leads to a life that is peaceful and full of joy.

entry.content:
#tcfm 2

Answer 33 Count in base negative 2.

...

In general, any base works like a set of building blocks of differnt sizes. In base 10, the blocks come in sizes 1, 10, 100, 1,000, etc. In base 2, the blocks come in sizes 1, 2, 4, 8, 16, etc. Combining units in these standard sizes creates any desired number.

So what would base -2 notation be?
